coreAtributes.name: latex pencil skirt
coreAtributes.description: A skin-tight skirt made of shiny, synthetic material.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your skirt and kick it off your feet.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s skirt down and slide it off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pull [npc.name]'s skirt down and slide it off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls down [npc.her] skirt, kicking it off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls your skirt down and slides it off your feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pulls your skirt down and slides it off your feet.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls [npc2.name]'s skirt down and slides it off [npc2.her] feet..
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] pulls [npc2.name]'s skirt down and slides it off [npc2.her] feet..

replacementText.playerSelf: You step into the skirt before pulling it up to your waist.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name] into the skirt before pulling it up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You force [npc.name] into the skirt before pulling it up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] steps into the skirt before pulling it up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides you into the skirt before pulling it up to your waist.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forces you into the skirt before pulling it up to your waist.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name] into the skirt before pulling it up to [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] forces [npc2.name] into the skirt before pulling it up to [npc2.her] waist.
